BASE OIL N70.subtitle: High-quality industrial base oil with multiple applications
BASE OIL N70.description: White base oils are highly refined mineral oils known for their purity, stability, and low volatility. They are widely used in pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, food-grade lubricants, and personal care products. White base oils offer excellent color stability and oxidation resistance, making them ideal for sensitive formulations.
usesdescription: Used in pharmaceutical ointments and creams
Ideal for cosmetic formulations like lotions and gels
Acts as a carrier oil in personal care products
Base for food-grade lubricants and greases
Used in textile, plastic, and rubber industries
BASE OIL N70.title: BASE OIL N70
